data.meta_description: I am so honored to have interviewed the former First Lady of Nigeria, Turai Yar’Adua, 13 years after the death of her husband, the former President of Nigeria,… | 72 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
Aisha Madina Maishanu’s Post

Senior Journalist at BBC News

1y

I am so honored to have interviewed the former First Lady of Nigeria, Turai Yar’Adua, 13 years after the death of her husband, the former President of Nigeria, Umaru Musa Yar’Adua. We spoke about what happened the day he died and how life has been after his death.

See more comments
